original_text: But Joab did not include Levi and Benjamin in the numbering, because the king’s command was repulsive to him.
korean_text: 요압이 왕의 명령을 마땅치 않게 여겨 레위와 베냐민 사람은 계수하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But Joab did not include Levi and Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 요압은 레위와 베냐민을 포함시키지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: because the king's command was repulsive to him
